metadata.title: CVE-2017-5840 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The qtdemux_parse_samples function in gst/isomp4/qtdemux.c ingst-plugins-good in GStreamer before 1.10.3 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read) via vectors involvingthe current stts index.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5840` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gstreamer0.10-gconf - 0.10.31-3+nmu4ubuntu2.16.04.3
gstreamer0.10-plugins-good - 0.10.31-3+nmu4ubuntu2.16.04.3
gstreamer0.10-pulseaudio - 0.10.31-3+nmu4ubuntu2.16.04.3
No subscription required

gstreamer1.0-plugins-good - 1.8.3-1ubuntu0.4
gstreamer1.0-pulseaudio - 1.8.3-1ubuntu0.4
libgstreamer-plugins-good1.0-0 - 1.8.3-1ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good0.10 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.31-3+nmu4ubuntu2.16.04.3').
gst-plugins-good1.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.3-1ubuntu0.4').
